lore: The average battery life of a Construct has been estimated to be 1000 days, which is when the battery has lost too much charge and the creature stops moving permanently. The batteries cannot be replaced, so the construct must be discarded, although the material of which its body is made can be reused.\n\nThe Bloodmail Construct was created with the main purpose of preventing civilians and soldiers from bleeding to death. At a touch of its armor, the blood is partially returned to the circulatory system, giving the doctors more options to save their life.
